page.title: 04KNIVETON PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Kniveton School is not very big.At the moment there are 33 children in school,17 of those being Infants and the others juniors. The children who come to the school live mainly in the village but some of them come quite a long way from different farms,and one or two are brought in from other areas by their parents. There are two full time teachers and one part-time teacher who comes for two half-days.There is a secretary who works for two mornings,an ancillary worker who comes in for two afternoons to help with the very young children. There is also a cook who prepares the meals,and a midday supervisor.There is also a part-time caretaker who comes in every morning and evening.
